Class MessageBox

java.lang.Object
MessageBox
public class MessageBox extends Object
Harry Yang 0% Recon Chen 100% (ideas on how to from brian song and luka jovanovic) last update 2024, 06, 08 Ms. Krasteva The message box class creats a default message box that can be implemented all throughout our levels.
